00045     public static function GetInstance ( )
00058         {

00063     public function OnLoad ( )
00079         {
00080                 parent::OnLoad();
00081                 
00082                 $appl = Application::GetInstance();
00083                 $DBVars = & @$appl->GetVariables[ DB_ARRAY_INDEX ];
00084                 
00085                 // set up all 'always' needed connections
00086                 foreach ( $DBVars as $key => $db )
00087                 {
00088                         if ( $db['alwaysUse'] && ! isset ( $DBVars[ $key ] ) )
00089                         {
00090                                 // set up
00091                                 $className = $db[ 'type' ].'Connection';
00092                                 $DBVars[ $key ] = new $className ( );
00093                                 
00094                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetServer( $db['host'] );
00095                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetUsername( $db['login'] );
00096                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetPassword( $db['password'] );
00097                                 
00098                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->Open( BDDConnection::CONNECTION_PERSISTENT );
00099                                 
00100                                 $DBVars[ $key ]->SetDatabase( $db['database'] );
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103                 
00104                 $className = $DBVars[ MYSQL_CONF_BASE ][ 'type' ].'TableVariable';
00105                 $configuration = new $className ( CONFIGURATION_TABLE_NAME, $DBVars[ MYSQL_CONF_BASE ], $errors );
00106 
00107                 $servConf = $configuration->SelectServerVariables();
00108                 $siteConf = $configuration->SelectSiteVariables( IDSITE );
00109                 
00110                 unset ( $configuration );
00111                 
00112                 if ( $siteConf InstanceOf Errors || $servConf InstanceOf Errors )
00113                 {
00114                         echo ( $siteConf . $servConf );
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         $conf = $servConf;
00119                         
00120                         foreach ( $siteConf as $siteVar )
00121                         {
00122                                 $conf->Add ( $siteVar );
00123                         }
00124                 
00125                         // load Server configuration
00126                         $appl->SetConfiguration( $conf );
00127                         
00128                         unset ( $conf );
00129                 }
00130                 
00131                 unset ( $servConf );
00132                 unset ( $siteConf );
00133 
00134                 $sessionsActivated = $appl->GetConfiguration()->GetVariableByName( SITE_SESSIONS_ACTIVATED );
00135                 
00136                 if ( ! ($sessionsActivated InstanceOf Errors) && $sessionsActivated->GetProperty ( TableVariable::TABLE_COLUMN_DATA ) )
00137                 {
00138                         // activate sessions
00139                         Session::GetInstance();
00140                 }
00141                 
00142                 unset ( $sessionsActivated );
00143                 unset ( $appl );
00144         } //---- End of OnLoad
00145

00152         {
